content:
US President Donald Trump
 warned China on Saturday that it should face consequences if it was "knowingly responsible" for the coronavirus
 pandemic, as he ratcheted up criticism of Beijing over its handling of the outbreak. "It could have been stopped in C… [+4093 chars]
